# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, we believe it would significantly enhance your experience and productivity. We're offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $10000. We're confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, making it a worthwhile purchase for you. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this unique opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
